summary: The module provides a comprehensive test suite for the Warp block, verifying gradient correctness, handling of mismatched input dimensions, performance against a reference ITK implementation, and the accuracy of resampling operations using helper utilities for loading images and applying warps.
business_intent: To guarantee the robustness and scientific validity of the image warping functionality within the MONAI framework, supporting reliable spatial transformations in medical imaging deepâ€‘learning pipelines and ensuring compatibility with external toolkits.
